task_descriptions: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk bot. Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk bot has told you to do so.

We'll give you some prompts along the way for inspiration. Right now, imagine you RSVP to a friend's party. Your friend's name is `HostName-1@schedule`.
Use your imagination to answer the questions by your AI assistant.
Come up with a reason to change topics to 'reserve a table at a restaurant'. (A phone call? Something you see? Something important that you almost forgot?)
You get a text from `HostName-1@schedule`: 'Hey! Have you RSVPed already?' (Of course you cannot answer to the text here, but this might change your dialogue with the AI assistant.)
You `MildInjury@generic`. Get your AI assistant to make an appointment with `DoctorName@schedule`.
